description: Returns one or more configured OpenSearch Serverless lifecycle policies. For more information, see Viewing data lifecycle policies.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: The unique identifiers of policy types and policy names. (dict) --- The unique identifiers of policy types and policy names. type (string) --- The type of lifecycle policy. name (string) --- The name of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: lifecyclePolicyDetails
nested_items.description: A list of lifecycle policies matched to the input policy name and policy type.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: policyVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: policy
nested_items.description: The JSON policy document without any whitespaces.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date the lifecycle policy was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the lifecycle policy was last modified.

nested_items.name: lifecyclePolicyErrorDetails
nested_items.description: A list of lifecycle policy names and policy types for which retrieval failed.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: A description of the error. For example, The specified Lifecycle Policy is not found.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The error code for the request. For example, NOT_FOUND.
